name: EntityRotationGestureRecognizer
desc: A gesture recognizer that uses rotation gestures involving two touches to rotate a given entity.

items.name: init(target: Any?, action: Selector?)
items.desc: Creates a rotation gesture recognizer with a target instance and an action selector.

items.name: var entity: HasCollision?
items.desc: The entity on which the recognizer operates.

items.name: func touchesBegan(Set<UITouch>, with: UIEvent)
items.desc: Tells the recognizer that the user has touched the entity with one or more fingers.
